name: CSV to Astra
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads CSV files from Google Cloud Storage and writes them into an Astra DB table.

parameters.name: inputCsv
parameters.label: Path of CSV in CloudStorage
parameters.helpText: CSV file in Google Cloud Storage.

parameters.name: astraSecureConnectBundle
parameters.label: ResourceID for Cloud secure bundle secret
parameters.helpText: Zip file to secure transport. Provide full resource ID in the form of  projects/${project_id}/secrets/${secret_name}/versions/1

parameters.name: astraToken
parameters.label: Resource ID for Astra token Secret
parameters.helpText: Astra token in a string saved as token. Provide full resource ID in the form of projects/${project_id}/secrets/${secret_name}/versions/1
